answerText: muscle tissue [10] The Krebs cycle takes place in this organelle, the "powerhouse of the cell." Slow-twitch or red muscle is rich in these organelles, which explains why it sustains aerobic activity.

subject: Science
question: Question: This body tissue contains the sarcoplasmic reticulum.  [10] Name this tissue that comes in smooth and striated forms and generates force via the protein myosin.
